info.en:
Location of Nodes
America

Server Configuration:
Major Server: Intel Xeon E5-2696 v4 @ 2.20GHz
CPU: 22 vCPU core
32GB RAM
SSD: Local PCIe 3.0 
Bandwidth: 1000 Mbps
SSD: 2048GB

Backup Server:
Intel Xeon Platinum 8173M @ 2.00GHz
CPU: 28 vCPU core
64GB RAM
SSD: Local PCIe 3.0
Bandwidth: 1000 Mbps
SSD: 2048GB

Group Introduction:
Established in November 2017, EOS WTZ is committed to building a respected platform for blockchain knowledge sharing. We work to build the most influential blockchian community that serves tens of millions of people through various forms such as blockchain knowledge sharing, original content output, interactive blockchain community and blockchain incubators.

团队介绍
EOS WTZ于2017年11月成立。致力建立最有温度的区块链知识传播平台，通过普及区块链基础知识、输出原创内容、打造圈内互动社区、孵化区块链项目等形式，打造国内最有影响力、服务千万人的区块链社群。
